Interface TAccountOwner

    public interface TAccountOwner
extends com.guidewire.bc.domain.accounting.gen.TAccountOwnerStubI
    TAccountOwner

    Represents an entity that has a set of T-Accounts.

    • Method Detail

      • getCharges

        java.util.List<Charge> getCharges()
        Returns the charges associated with this t-account owner\
        Returns:
        charges

      • getChargesOfName

        java.util.List<Charge> getChargesOfName(ChargePattern chargePattern)
        Returns the charges of the given charge pattern associated with this t-account owner.
        Returns:
        charges of the given name

      • doWriteoff

        Writeoff doWriteoff(MonetaryAmount amount,
                  WriteoffReason writeoffReason)
        Writes off the given amount on the t-account owner. The writeoff amount will be distributed among the outstanding invoice items using the standard charge payment allocation algorithm.

      • doWriteoff

        Writeoff doWriteoff(ChargePattern chargePattern,
                  MonetaryAmount amount,
                  WriteoffReason writeoffReason)
        Writes off the given amount only for the given charge pattern on this t-account owner. The writeoff amount will be distributed among the outstanding invoice items for the charge pattern using the standard charge payment allocation algorithm.
        See Also:
        doWriteoff(gw.pl.currency.MonetaryAmount, gw.bc.accounting.typekey.WriteoffReason)

      • doWriteoff

        Writeoff doWriteoff(Writeoff writeoff,
                  ChargePattern chargePattern,
                  MonetaryAmount amount,
                  WriteoffReason writeoffReason)
        Given an existing Writeoff entity, this writes off the given amount only for the given charge pattern on this t-account owner. The writeoff amount will be distributed among the outstanding invoice items for the charge pattern using the standard charge payment allocation algorithm.

      • getTAccountsSortedByName

        TAccount[] getTAccountsSortedByName()
        Returns all t-accounts owned by this t-account owner which also have the given label in the TAccountRef definition in the accounting config. Sorts the t-accounts found by name.
        Returns:
        t-accounts on the owner

      • getInvoiceItems

        InvoiceItem[] getInvoiceItems()
        Returns all of the invoice items related to this t-account owner.
        Returns:
        invoice items

      • getTransactions

        IQueryBeanResult getTransactions()
        Returns all of the transactions for a this TAccountOwner
        Returns:
        an array of Transactions

      • getScheduledPayments

        InvoiceItem[] getScheduledPayments()

      • getChargePatterns

        java.util.Collection<ChargePattern> getChargePatterns()
        Returns charge infos for all of the charges on this t-account owner

      • getDueTAccountPatterns

        java.util.List<TAccountPattern> getDueTAccountPatterns()

      • getUnbilledAmount

        MonetaryAmount getUnbilledAmount()
        Returns the aggregate balance for all unbilled t-accounts for all charges on this t-account owner.

      • getBilledAmount

        MonetaryAmount getBilledAmount()
        Returns the aggregate balance for all billed t-accounts.

      • getDueAmount

        MonetaryAmount getDueAmount()
        Returns the aggregate balance for all t-accounts returned by getDueTAccountPatterns().

      • getDelinquentAmount

        MonetaryAmount getDelinquentAmount()
        Returns the maximum of the due amount or zero.

      • getOutstandingAmount

        MonetaryAmount getOutstandingAmount()
        Returns the outstanding amount on the t-account owner. This is the sum of the current billed and due balances.

      • getRemainingBalance

        MonetaryAmount getRemainingBalance()
        Returns the total remaining balance on the t-account owner. This is the sum of the current outstanding and unbilled amounts.

      • getTotalValue

        MonetaryAmount getTotalValue()
        Gets the total value of all charges on the t-account owner. This is equal to the total amount we expect to receive in payment over the lifetime of the t-account owner.

      • getWriteoffExpense

        MonetaryAmount getWriteoffExpense()

      • getNegativeWriteoff

        MonetaryAmount getNegativeWriteoff()

      • getPaidOrWrittenOffAmount

        MonetaryAmount getPaidOrWrittenOffAmount()
        Gets the total amount paid. This is equal to the total value of the t-account owner minus remaining balance. Note that this method includes writeoffs in the paid amount; to exclude writeoffs, call getPaidAmount().

        NOTE: this method does not consider unapplied funds as being "paid"; it only considers funds actually distributed down to charges.

        See Also:
        getTotalValue(), getRemainingBalance()

      • getPaidAmount

        MonetaryAmount getPaidAmount()
        Gets the total amount paid. This is equal to the total value of the t-account owner minus remaining balance and minus writeoff expense. To include writeoffs, call getPaidOrWrittenOffAmount().
        See Also:
        getPaidOrWrittenOffAmount()

      • getUnpaidAmount

        MonetaryAmount getUnpaidAmount()
        This is the total value minus the paid amount.

      • getUnappliedAmount

        MonetaryAmount getUnappliedAmount()
        Returns the amount held in suspension as of the given date. This is money that has been distributed to the t-account owner (e.g. after a payment or funds transfer) but has not yet been allocated to pay a specific charge.

      • getSuspenseAmount

        MonetaryAmount getSuspenseAmount()
        Returns the amount promised towards policies as of the given date. This is money that has been distributed to the t-account owner (e.g. after a payment or funds transfer) and is intended towards a policy but has not yet been allocated to that policy

      • hasDelinquentItems

        boolean hasDelinquentItems()
        Returns:
        if the taccount owner has any invoice items that are delinquent
